sceneDescription.title: Captain's Tales in the Inn Common Room

setting.location: Common room, Admiral Benbow Inn, Devon

characters.appearance: Sea captain, 50s, animated expression, gesturing wildly
characters.clothing: Loosened blue coat, white shirt open at neck
characters.position: Seated at head of large table
characters.action: Telling dramatic story, one hand raised mimicking sword fight

characters.clothing: Brown vest, white shirt, serving apron
characters.action: Frozen mid-pour, completely absorbed in tale

characters.appearance: Three local fishermen, various ages, weathered faces

scene.mainElements: Warm firelit room filled with pipe smoke, captain holding court with tales of piracy and adventure on high seas, audience captivated by stories
scene.details: Pewter mugs and plates on table, fire crackling in large stone hearth, shadows dancing on walls, rain-streaked windows reflecting firelight, nautical implements decorating walls, boy's pitcher tilting dangerously as he forgets his task
scene.background: Dark corners of room, other patrons in shadows, stairs leading to upper floors
scene.atmosphere: Cozy yet thrilling, mixture of warmth and danger in captain's tales, hypnotic storytelling

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot capturing storyteller and audience
composition.focus: Captain's animated face and gesturing hand
composition.depth: Captain prominent in foreground, listeners arranged in middle ground, fireplace and room details in background
